MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH42 postcode area of Dunbar. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1pm to repair electrical equipment on Gala Green and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.38pm on Tuesday 10th November 2020.
